config.pingstabilizer.title: Ping Stabilizer Configuration
config.pingstabilizer.experimental.warni: âš  WARNING: These features are experimental and may cause issues. Use at your own risk!
config.pingstabilizer.tooltip.tcpNoDelay: Disables Nagle's algorithm. Most important setting for low latency.
config.pingstabilizer.tooltip.priorityFl: Immediately flushes critical combat packets. Essential for PvP.
config.pingstabilizer.tooltip.customBuff: Enable custom socket buffer sizes. Only for advanced users.
config.pingstabilizer.tooltip.sendBuffer: Size of the send buffer in KB. Default: 128
config.pingstabilizer.tooltip.receiveBuf: Size of the receive buffer in KB. Default: 128
config.pingstabilizer.tooltip.smartQueue: Intelligent packet prioritization. CRITICAL packets are never delayed.
config.pingstabilizer.tooltip.adaptiveTh: Batches BULK packets during congestion. CRITICAL packets unaffected.
config.pingstabilizer.tooltip.maxHoldMs: Maximum time any packet can be held in queue. Default: 100ms
config.pingstabilizer.tooltip.enableDebu: Write detailed debug logs to Desktop/pingstabilizer_debug.txt
config.pingstabilizer.tooltip.enableHud: Show network statistics overlay on screen.
config.pingstabilizer.tooltip.showJitter: Display ping variance. High jitter = unstable connection.
